Label: Pass
Description: Library Aliquot passed Alignment QA/QC. The fastq files should be released and included in resequencing events.

Label: Fail-Flag
Description: Library Aliquot has failed alignment for some metrics for QA/QC and should be flagged in analysis. The fastq files should be released and included in resequencing events.

Label: Fail-Withhold
Description: Library Aliquot has failed alignment QA/QC and should not be used in analysis. Fastq files should not be released nor used in resequencing events.

Label: TBD
Description: Library Aliquot alignment QC Result has not yet been determined
